title: [Arboreal Platform]
description: This sturdy platform seems to have served as a vantage point for someone or something.  From here is commanded a magnificent view of the surrounding countryside as well as a leafy alcove protected from spying eyes and silvery moon.

This sturdy platform seems to have served as a vantage point for someone or something.  From here is commanded a magnificent view of the surrounding countryside as well as a leafy alcove protected from spying eyes and blazing sun.
